title: Night of the Oni
desc: Steal the artifact. Escape through the Torii. Don’t get caught.

title: Tap to Survive
desc: Panic mini-game: your life is draining constantly. Tap to stay alive as long as you can.

title: Relationship Forecast 2
desc: Provide two names. Receive a brutally honest, TikTok-level relationship verdict.

title: Reaction Speed Test
desc: Tap as fast as possible when the screen flashes.

title: Angry Fruit
desc: Colorful arcade chaos with emotionally unstable fruit.

title: Tap To Survive 2
desc: One finger, one tiny character, one draining life bar. Tap to keep them alive as the chaos ramps up.

title: Face Remix
desc: Upload a selfie, choose a vibe – princess, cyberpunk, anime hero – and let the pixels turn you into a stylized character.
